sources.title: Once Upon a Texas Train | FULL MOVIE | Western
sources.description:
Captain Hayes of the mighty law enforcement squad named The Texas Rangers reaches thee pinnacle of his career when he captures the notorious John Henry, an outlaw cowboy, and puts him behind bars.

#action #western #classicmovies #texas #texasrangers #outlaw #cowboys #westernmovies #johnhenry #captain

sources.title: Once Upon a Texas Train | FULL MOVIE | 1988 | Western, Action, Comedy | Willie Nelson, Shaun Cassidy
sources.description:
Richard Widmark, Shaun Cassidy, Angie Dickinson and Willie Nelson star in this story of an outlaw cowboy who is freed after 20 years behind bars and is seeking revenge against the now retired Texas Ranger who put him there.

Directed: Burt Kennedy
1988
Cast: Angie Dickinson, Richard Widmark, Willie Nelson, Shaun Cassidy

Also features a cast of legendary Western actors including Chuck Connors, Jack Elam, Dub Taylor, Ken Curtis, Stuart Whitman, Royal Dano and Gene Evans

#western #willienelson #shauncassidy #texas #trainmovie

metadata.Plot: Captain Hayes of the mighty law enforcement squad named the Texas Rangers reached the pinnacle of his career when he captured the notorious John Henry, an outlaw cowboy, and put him behind bars. Twenty years later, upon his release, Henry is older but unrepentant. Within six hours after leaving his jail cell, he evens the score with Hayes by holding up the Bank of Texas for $20,000 in gold. Hayes, in his fury, gets himself out of retirement to take up the chase once more.
metadata.Actors: Willie Nelson, Richard Widmark, Shaun Cassidy
